data.name: Warna
data.detailed_description:
No mercy, kill them all.
Soul's like a third-person action game. To win, you need to beat off all the waves of opponents in the allotted time and fight the boss. Souls drop out of the killed opponents, for which you can acquire skills, weapons, and potions of health and mana, which are saved in the event of the character's death. The player can run and dodge enemy attacks by rolling.
Treatment, mana recovery and magic attacks are available from the fast slots. Three slots for weapons that change with the mouse wheel.
data.about_the_game:
No mercy, kill them all.
Soul's like a third-person action game. To win, you need to beat off all the waves of opponents in the allotted time and fight the boss. Souls drop out of the killed opponents, for which you can acquire skills, weapons, and potions of health and mana, which are saved in the event of the character's death. The player can run and dodge enemy attacks by rolling.
Treatment, mana recovery and magic attacks are available from the fast slots. Three slots for weapons that change with the mouse wheel.
data.short_description: Try to survive if you can! Soul's like a third-person action game. There are four skills and six types of weapons available, plus bonus weapons that fall from mobs and have a limited number of hits. Three types of potions. All acquired skills, weapons and potions are saved.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3,3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700, AMD Ryzen 7 3700x
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
